title: The Last Daughter of Lilith
description: Katrina is an ordinary girl in every way. Until one day, a handsome man appears at her doorstep, her parents disappear and she is forced into a world she never believed existed. Join Katrina as she discovers her own history, battles demons and discovers her own true power, all while gearing up for a battle that will decide the fate of her people.
author: J.L. Metcalf
